Camera.cameraPermission: Allow AgroGram to access your camera to take photos for posts and products.
Camera.photosPermission: Allow AgroGram to access your photos to select images.

Geolocation.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUse: Allow AgroGram to access your location to show nearby markets and weather information.
Geolocation.locationAlways: Allow AgroGram to access your location in the background.
Geolocation.locationWhenInUse: Allow AgroGram to access your location.
